mapper.insert: insert into PRODUCT ( pd_code, pd_name, pd_rmcost, pd_manufcost, pd_sort, pd_delete ) values ( 'p' || TO_CHAR(pd_code.nextval), #{pd_name}, #{pd_rmcost}, #{pd_manufcost}, #{pd_sort}, 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT m.mfseq ,m.pd_code ,p.pd_name ,to_char(manuf_startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as manuf_startdate ,to_char(manuf_enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as manuf_enddate ,m.manuf_status ,m.warehouse_code ,m.manuf_amount ,m.manuf_requserid ,to_char(manuf_reqdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as manuf_reqdate ,m.mf_delete FROM manufacture m, product p WHERE m.pd_code = p.pd_code and m.mf_delete='N'

SELECT m.mfseq ,m.pd_code ,p.pd_name ,to_char(manuf_startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as manuf_startdate ,manuf_enddate ,m.manuf_status ,m.warehouse_code ,m.manuf_amount ,m.manuf_requserid ,manuf_reqdate ,mf_delete FROM manufacture m, product p WHERE m.pd_code = p.pd_code and m.mf_delete='N' and mfseq=#{mfseq}
SELECT pd_code ,pd_name ,pd_rmcost ,pd_manufcost ,pd_sort ,pd_delete FROM product WHERE pd_delete='N'
mapper.update: update manufacture set manuf_status=#{manuf_status}, manuf_enddate=sysdate where mfseq=#{mfseq}
mapper.select: SELECT pd_code ,pd_name ,pd_rmcost ,pd_manufcost ,pd_sort FROM product WHERE pd_code=(SELECT MAX(pd_code) FROM product)
SELECT pd_code ,pd_name ,pd_rmcost ,pd_manufcost ,pd_sort FROM product WHERE pd_code=#{pd_code}

SELECT pm.product_material_code ,pm.pd_code ,pm.rawm_code ,pm.product_material_amount ,rm.supplierseq ,rm.rawm_name ,rm.rawm_sort ,rm.rawm_price ,rm.rawm_notice ,rm.rawm_minimum ,rm.rawm_delete FROM product_material pm JOIN rawmaterial rm ON pm.rawm_code = rm.rawm_code WHERE pm.pd_code=#{pd_code}
mapper.update:
update manufacture set pd_code = #{pd_code}, manuf_startdate = to_char(to_date(#{manuf_startdate},'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY-MM-DD'), warehouse_code= #{warehouse_code}, manuf_amount= #{manuf_amount}, manuf_requserid= #{manuf_requserid}
where mfseq = #{mfseq}
